data.title: Cyber 5 online sales grew 8.2% in 2024
data.description: Online sales set multiple records during the Cyber 5, which includes Thanksgiving and the four days that follow.

data.title: Prime Day 2024 drives record sales for overall US ecommerce
data.description: Amazon itself didn't specify how much it made in Prime Day 2024 sales, but its event led to online retail discounting across the industry.

data.title: Amazon announces return of Prime Big Deal Days in 2024
data.description: The online marketplace offered an October Prime Day equivalent in 2023 as well.

data.title: When is Amazon Prime Day? Experts predict July 11 or July 18
data.description: It's the question that marketplace sellers, analysts, vendors and everyone else in the Amazon ecosystem want answered: When will Prime Day be in 2022? Hints in Amazon's online community for 3rd-party sellers suggest it will be July 11 or July 18.

data.title: US ecommerce sales reached $1.119 trillion in 2023
data.description: U.S. ecommerce represented 22.0% of total retail sales, according to Digital Commerce 360 analysis of U.S. Department of Commerce data.
